content: अन्वक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अनुगतःअक्षं इंद्रियं गतिसमा.] {@--1@} Visible, perceptible. {@--2@} Following, close on the heels of, immediately following. --क्षं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Afterwards, after; आरोह त्वं… सीतां चारोपयान्वक्षं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} Immediately after, forthwith, directly; <ls>Y. 3. 21.</ls>
